actions.text: Amendment SA 6493 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 52. Record Vote Number: 361.
Amendment SA 6493 proposed by Senator Lankford for Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 6487. (consideration: CR S6837-6839, S6841, S6844 ; text: CR S6837) To eliminate a private right of action.
